events.name: Learn about Algolia
events.description: Algolia offers a hosted search API that delivers instant and relevant results. Join us on April 14th to hear Alex Kudelka and Nicolas Baissas from Algolia give a talk on the company’s philosophy on search and why they made a proprietary search engine. They will also give a live demo on Algolia’s new InstantSearch.js technology. Food and drinks will be provided! :)
events.location: Amazon Web Services Office, Level 10, 23 Church Street, Singapore

events.name: talk.js
events.description: The next talk.js will be on Thursday 14th April. Scheduled Talks • RxJS - Ryan Dao • Nativefier - Jia Hao • Motion detection in yo' browser  - Sher Minn •  JS Performance - Huiren Woo • Ambient Dynamix : JS and IoT - Shivam Verma Location PayPal Singapore Suntec Tower 5 5 Temasek Boulevard #09-01 Singapore Venue, free drinks and pizza sponsored by PayPal. Remember to bring photo ID to get through building security. Feel free to ask questions in the SingaporeJS gitter room: https://gitter.im/SingaporeJS/discussions See you there!
events.location: PayPal Singapore, Suntec Tower 5, 5 Temasek Boulevard #09-01

events.name: Scaling Scrum with Nexus
events.description: Rob Maher is a founding trainer with Scrum.org. He is one of only a handful of trainers worldwide who are qualified and experienced enough to be able to teach the entire Scrum.org curriculum of courses. He is currently an Agile coach. Rob has run both technical and Scrum training extensively throughout SE Asia. Rob is also one of the few Accredited Kanban Trainers (AKT's) with David Andersons Lean Kanban University. This means that he can teach Accredited Kanban Practioner Training. You can read more about Rob Maher at www.robmaherconsulting.co.nz He will speak about Scaling in Scrum Projects and how Nexus can help with it. Feel free to reach me @[masked] if you have any issues. Agenda: 7:00pm - Scaling in Scrum Projects 8:30pm - O&A
events.location: #03-04, IDA Labs@NDC 111 Middle Road, National Design Centre, Singapore 188969., IDA Labs@NDC 111 Middle Road, National Design Centre

events.name: ArtScience Late x Singapore Art Book Fair
events.description:
ArtScience Late x Singapore Art Book Fair
Thu,14 April
7.30pm
Lobby

This ArtScience Late, gather for a soiree of poetry and music featuring literary collective Ten Year Series and electronic duo .gif. Part of the opening programme of Singapore Art Book Fair 2016 at ArtScience Museum (14 – 17 April).
